## Summary

Brief description of changes.

## Type

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation

## Checklist

> **E2E tests (WebGPU):** WebGPU API is not available in CI. You must run `npm run test:e2e` **locally** and ensure it passes before submitting a PR.

- [ ] `npm run lint` passes
- [ ] `npm run type-check` passes
- [ ] `npm run build` passes
- [ ] `npm run test:e2e` passes (run locally; WebGPU is not available in CI)
